alert.note: Alert for Chenango (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 4:52PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Chenango County through 515 PM EDT... At 449 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Plymouth, or near Norwich, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Norwich, Plymouth, North Norwich, Preston, Holmesville, South Plymouth and Polkville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
